court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 1346/2015 of J.M.F.C.- II, PATHANAMTHITTA CRIME NO. 1040/2013 OF KONNI POLICE STATION , PATHANAMTITTA PETITIONER/ACCUSED (S) : SHOBAN BABU, AGED 35 YEARS, S/O.P.T.THANKACHAN, AMBARAYIL
full_text: RERAe eo nets Ele 2017/KER/696 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT : THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN V FRIDAY, THE 6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2017/16TH POUSHA, 1938 Cr1.MC.No. 123 of 2017 () AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1346/2015 of J.M.F.C.- II, PATHANAMTHITTA CRIME NO. 1040/2013 OF KONNI POLICE STATION , PATHANAMTITTA PETITIONER/ACCUSED (S) : SHOBAN BABU, AGED 35 YEARS, S/O.P.T.THANKACHAN, AMBARAYILPARAMBIL, THANNITHODU VILLAGE, KOZHENCHERRY TALUK, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT-689699. BY ADV. SRI.AJEESH K.SASI RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT & STATE(S): STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI. E.C. BINEESH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06-01-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: kp Beas 2017/KER/696 RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.YV., J ~ CrLM.C. No. 123 of 2017 Dated 6" January, 2017 ORDER 1.The petitioner is the sole accused in C.C.No.1346 of 2015 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of i* Class-II, Pathanamthitta. On his failure to appear before the learned Magistrate, Non Bailable Warrant has been issued against him. 2.In this petition filed under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, the prayer is to issue necessary directions to the learned Magistrate to consider his application for recall of warrant and grant of bail on the date of surrender itself. 3.Having heard the learned counsel and the learned Public Prosecutor, this petition is disposed of by ordering that if the petitioner surrenders before the court below and moves appropriate application for recall of warrant and grant of bail within a period of two weeks from today, with pale apie 2017/KER/696 Crl.M.C. No. 123 of 2017 -2- advance notice to the concerned prosecutor, the court below shall consider and dispose of the same, on its merits, preferably on the date of surrender itself. Sd/- RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.YV., JUDGE kp/6.1.17
